Title: Directs the commissioner of education and commissioner of labor to study the appropriateness of county placement in the regional cost index used for the school aid formula
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education and commissioner of labor to study the appropriateness of county placement in the regional cost index used for the school aid formula.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the commissioner of education and the commissioner of labor to study the appropriateness of county placement in the regional cost index used for the school aid formula
